review: Had a fall here in Las Vegas right when we were moving here and we were fortunate enough to find Aaron and his firm. Met with him and had a great consult and made us feel like we were genuine after others we called brushed us off. Took us a bit of time but with all email and call communications he made it very easy for us and we ended up settling with a full policy. This was a wonderful outcome for me since this helps set us up for any future bills. I would highly recommend this firm. Definitely took excellent care of us and the communications were top notch as he always responded any time we called or emailed. That was very appreciated.
